nodes.text: Salvador Larroca (born 1964) is a Spanish comic book artist who has provided artwork for Kieron Gillen's Darth Vader series published by Marvel Comics. He also is the penciller of the Star Wars main series, and the first issue of Doctor Aphra with the series' main penciller, Kev Walker. Larroca is best known for penciling Chris Claremont's run on Fantastic Four and X-Treme X-Men, and Matt Fraction's Invincible Iron Man series.
Larroca designed the character of Doctor Cylo in his image.
